docs.snippet: Secretary of State John Kerry said Tuesday the U.S. may need "more forceful ways" of dealing with North Korea if it develops an intercontinental ballistic missile that threatens America....
docs.lead_paragraph: Secretary of State John Kerry said Tuesday the U.S. may need "more forceful ways" of dealing with North Korea if it develops an intercontinental ballistic missile that threatens America.

headline.main: Kerry: 'More Forceful Ways' May Be Needed With North Korea

docs.snippet: David Beckham sent shockwaves around the world when he signed with Los Angeles Galaxy in 2007, giving Major League Soccer a level of legitimacy and visibility that otherwise may have taken decades to reach before the ink on his contract was barely...

docs.snippet: Germany's interior and justice ministers, representing the two blocs in Chancellor Angela Merkel's ruling coalition, agreed on Tuesday on tougher measures for asylum seekers whose documents are not in order or who are deemed to pose a security thr...
docs.lead_paragraph: Germany's interior and justice ministers, representing the two blocs in Chancellor Angela Merkel's ruling coalition, agreed on Tuesday on tougher measures for asylum seekers whose documents are not in order or who are deemed to pose a security threat.

headline.main: German Ministers Agree Tougher Rules for Migrants Posing Security Risk
headline.print_headline: German Ministers Agree Tougher Rules for Migrants Posing Security Risk

docs.snippet: U.S. President-elect Donald Trump urged congressional Republicans to repeal Obamacare immediately on Tuesday, saying there was no cause for delay and that a replacement plan should follow the repeal within weeks, according to an interview with the...
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. President-elect Donald Trump urged congressional Republicans to repeal Obamacare immediately on Tuesday, saying there was no cause for delay and that a replacement plan should follow the repeal within weeks, according to an interview with the New York Times.

headline.main: Trump Calls for Immediate Obamacare Repeal, Quick Replacement: NYT
headline.print_headline: Trump Calls for Immediate Obamacare Repeal, Quick Replacement: NYT

docs.snippet: A Chinese H-6 strategic bomber flew around the Spratly Islands at the weekend in a new show of force in the contested South China Sea, a U.S. official said on Tuesday....
